mapper.select: select code as value,name from sys_area where parentCode=#{cityCode} and isvalid=1
SELECT fieldCode value,fieldValue name FROM dynamicform_field_value WHERE isValid=1 AND widgetCode ='resourceType'
select cast(id as char) value,name,cast(minPrice as char) min,cast(maxPrice as char) max from sys_cityavgpricelabel where cityCode=#{cityCode} and type=1

select
a.name dimension
d.realName dimension
e.name dimension
c.houseUse dimension
b.status dimension
b.sourceType dimension
${cell_sql} from demand_customerBusinessInfo b
right join sys_dept a on b.permissionArea like concat(a.id,'%') and b.companyId = a.companyId
right join sys_user d on d.id = b.operatorId
left join sys_area e on e.parentCode =b.cityCodes and find_in_set(e.code,b.areaCodes)
left join (select replace(substring(substring_index(#{houseUseId},',',id), char_length(substring_index(#{houseUseId},',',id - 1)) + 1),',','') as houseUseId, replace(substring(substring_index(#{houseUse},',',id), char_length(substring_index(#{houseUse},',',id - 1)) + 1),',','') as houseUse from sys_seq where id <= length(#{houseUseId}) - length(replace(#{houseUseId}, ',', '') )+1)c on find_in_set(c.houseUseId,b.houseUsesIds)
where b.isvalid=1 and b.transactionTypeId = 5 and b.isvalid=1 and b.companyId=#{companyId} and b.operatorCityCode=#{cityCode}
and a.id=#{deptId}
and b.recordTime >=#{beginRecordTime}
and b.recordTime <=#{endRecordTime}
and b.mainterFllowTime >=#{beginMainterFllowTime}
and b.mainterFllowTime <=#{endMainterFllowTime}
and a.deptTypeId=2
and a.deptTypeId=3
and a.deptTypeId=4
and a.deptTypeId=5
group by
a.id
d.id
e.code
c.houseUseId
b.statusId
b.sourceTypeId
